author: Simon Difford
description: A fresh-breath-tastic riff on the classic Daiquiri.
name: Mint & Honey Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White (charcoal-filtered) 1-4 year old light rum
15 ml Chilled water (omit if wet ice)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR honey and rum in base of shaker until honey dissolves
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
